"New Seattle's #1 zombie eatery!"
Don't feel like crawling out of the grave to dine with us? Let us shamble to you! Download our app, Romero2Go, to place an order for delivery. Please note, we place a non-negotiable 20% surcharge on delivery orders as a tip for our Walking Dead.
